title: Bitcoin Exchange Paxful Agrees to Plead Guilty, Hit With $7.5 Million in Penalties
contentSnippet: Authorities say Paxful was used by money launderers and other criminals—and that the Bitcoin exchange knew about it.

title: Official Trump Crypto Game Revealed With $1 Million in Solana Meme Coin Rewards
contentSnippet: Trump Billionaires Club on iOS and Android will launch by year's end and offer $1 million worth of the president's meme coin as rewards.

title: Gemini wins CFTC approval for prediction market, may expand into crypto futures, options and perps
contentSnippet: Gemini's Designated Contract Market will offer binary event contracts and may expand into other CFTC-regulated derivatives.

title: State Street and Galaxy to Launch Tokenized Liquidity Fund on Solana in 2026
contentSnippet: The fund will run on Solana at launch and use PYUSD.

title: Crypto CEOs Join U.S. CFTC's Innovation Council to Steer Market Developments
contentSnippet: The chief executives of firms such as Gemini and Kraken will pitch in on U.S. policy efforts through the council's future, public discussions.

title: Elon Musk's SpaceX Moves Bitcoin Ahead of Potential Record IPO
contentSnippet: Elon Musk's private aerospace company SpaceX moved more of its Bitcoin holdings on Wednesday ahead of reported blockbuster IPO plans.

title: Crypto Debanking and Efforts to 'Weaponize Finance' Must End, Says Top US Banking Regulator
contentSnippet: Major U.S. banks denied services to crypto and other lawful businesses based on industry rather than risk, an OCC preliminary report finds.

title: Stripe Acqui-Hires Crypto Payments Startup Valora, Venturing Further Into Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The team behind the Celo-based app is joining Stripe, while the intellectual property is returned to cLabs.

title: Tether Pivots to Wellness Apps and Robotics in Latest Step Away from Crypto
contentSnippet: The stablecoin giant is using its cash surplus to fund a disparate string of side ventures, from humanoid robots to calorie-counting AI.

title: A Startup Is Trying to Take the Twitter Name From Elon Musk by Force—And It Might Work
contentSnippet: Operation Bluebird, led by Twitter's former trademark lawyer, filed to cancel X Corp's Twitter trademarks after Musk abandoned the brand. Will Musk spend millions defending a name he deliberately kill

title: U.S. Banking Regulator Warns Wall Street on 'Debanking,' Claims Practices 'Unlawful'
contentSnippet: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency probed debanking of certain industries, including digital assets, and said it'll pursue any repeat of such activity.

title: 'National Security' at Risk If MSCI Excludes Crypto Treasuries, Warns Bitcoin Giant Strategy
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury leader Strategy argued to MSCI that excluding a crypto-buying firms from its indices would hurt America’s national security.

title: Bitcoin Swings Wildly as Fed's Powell Straddles Labor Market and Inflation Issues
contentSnippet: "Powell is threading the needle between their two mandates," said one analyst.

title: GameStop Stock Falls After Bitcoin Holdings Lose Value, Firm Says It Could Sell BTC
contentSnippet: Markets haven’t reacted well to GameStop’s latest earnings call, where it revealed sinking Bitcoin value and retail sales alike.

title: A16z-backed Lead Bank adds Loop Crypto to inner circle with eye on scaling stablecoins and payments
contentSnippet: Lead Bank is a 97-year-old community bank that has, in recent years, pivoted to serving fintechs and crypto companies.

title: Bitcoin and ETH whipsaw after Fed’s quarter-point cut and caution on further easing
contentSnippet: Traders are shifting expectations, with futures markets pricing a nearly 40% chance of another cut by March despite the Fed’s cautious tone.

title: A16z Crypto to Open Seoul Office, Hire Sungmo Park to Lead Asia Efforts
contentSnippet: Andreessen Horowitz's crypto venture capital unit pointed to high levels of crypto ownership in South Korea and Singapore, and growing onchain activity in Japan.

title: Consumer Groups Join Unions Trying to Derail U.S. Crypto Market Structure Bill
contentSnippet: Political progressives have joined forces to oppose current versions of the industry-backed legislative effort in the Senate.

title: Paxful Pleads Guilty to Aiding Crime, Ignoring AML Laws
contentSnippet: The DOJ said the firm knowingly facilitated illicit trades tied to sex work, sanctions evasion, and fraud, earning millions in fees while ignoring U.S. law.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Waver as Fed Delivers Third Rate Cut
contentSnippet: The central bank’s move was widely expected, with the Federal Reserve announcing the third rate cut for 2025.

title: Federal Reserve Cuts Rates 25 Basis Points, With Two Members Voting for Steady Policy
contentSnippet: The anticipated move comes as policymakers are still operating without several key economic data releases that remain delayed or suspended due to the U.S. government shutdown.

title: Elon Musk Says DOGE Flagged Billions in Federal 'Zombie Payments'
contentSnippet: In a new interview, Musk detailed how the short-lived government efficiency effort identified improper federal spending and drew political pushback.

title: The Daily: Silk Road bitcoin wallets wake up, SEC Chair Atkins signals quick action on crypto priorities, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: CryptoQuant says bitcoin could reach $112,000 if Fed turns dovish and key resistance levels break
contentSnippet: The firm said bitcoin could move toward $112,000 in the near term, but only if it clears two key resistance levels first.

title: Stripe acquires Valora wallet team as it builds out stablecoin services
contentSnippet: Stripe has acquired the team behind peer-to-peer mobile payments app startup Valora, though not the app itself.

title: The Protocol: Stripe’s Tempo Testnet Goes Live
contentSnippet: Also: ZKSync Lite to Sunset, Blockstream App Update, Axelar’s AgentFlux

title: Strategy says MSCI’s 50% bitcoin test risks index ‘whiplash’ and conflicts with US pro-innovation policy
contentSnippet: Strategy argues MSCI’s proposed crypto holding threshold would be impossible to apply consistently and would "stifle innovation."

title: Crypto AI ‘four times better’ than ChatGPT and Grok raises $15 million
contentSnippet: The startup named Surf says over 300,000 people are using the platform with more than a million search results.

title: Trump brothers’ American Bitcoin adds another $38 million of the cryptocurrency as total holdings rise to 4,783 BTC
contentSnippet: Eric Trump said the company has become one of the fastest-growing bitcoin accumulators since its Nasdaq listing three months ago.

title: Polychain and Variant-backed ‘neo-brokerage’ Cascade wants to open 24/7 perps trading for any asset class
contentSnippet: Cascade raised $15 million in seed funding in a round co-led by Polychain and Variant, with support from Coinbase Ventures.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
